rgFranchises.strName: ef a fairy tale of the two

data.strFullDescription:
[h2]Story[/h2][p]The story continues where "ef -Â  the first tale" leaves off. This time, it's Yuu's turn to tell Yuuko about the many encounters he's had in their years apart. His story begins with a young woman named Chihiro Shindou who has perhaps lost more than just her eye... [/p][p]
[/p][h2]Description & Features[/h2][p]- Experience three slice-of-life stories filled with romance and drama in an iconic setting that inspired the hit anime series "ef - a tale of melodies."
[/p][p]
[/p][p]- Over a thousand CGs to experience (counting variants), fully voiced heroines, and special effects which bring the characters to life such as animated facial expressions, lip sync, and more.
[/p][p]- A soundtrack with 40 unique, iconic tracks by TENMON of minori fame.
[/p][p]- Approximately 30+ hours of average reading time.[/p]
data.strSnippet: In this direct continuation of "ef - the first tale", Yuu tells the tale of a young woman who has lost one of her eyes due to an accident, but who may have lost so much more beneath the surface.
